title: 乌鸦角
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:penumbra-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:fade-in speed=3]]

[[module CSS]]
#page-title { display: none; }
.avatar-hover { display: none !important; }

:root:lang(cn) {
  --header-title: "乌鸦角";
  --header-subtitle: "现在石棉减少了30%！";
}
 :root {
 --accentColor:  243, 135, 57;

  --borderColor: #E98D5B !important;
/*  --bgBadgeColor: (COLOR HERE) !important;*/

  --wlgold: #ffd450;
}

/* LIMIT FADE-IN */
#page-content > :nth-child(n+35) {
    animation-delay: 9s;
}

/* Tabview backgrounds are icky */
.yui-navset .yui-content { background:transparent; padding:none;}

 /* FANART FORMATTING */
.art img {max-width: 80%; margin-top: 1em;}

/*  CELL & TABLE STYLING  */
#page-content table {
  border-spacing: 0.8rem;
  margin: auto;
  table-layout: fixed;
  width: 90%;
}
.top { margin-bottom: -0.8rem !important;  max-width: 50% !important; }
#page-content table img { margin-top: 8px; width: 100%; }

#page-content td {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: bottom;
  padding: 10px 0px 0px 0px;
  border: 3px solid #878B96;
  background: #3D424C;
  margin: auto;
}
/* Make WL stuff look very very special */
#page-content .wl {
  border-color: var(--wlgold);
  background: #34502c;
}
.wl a{ box-shadow: none !important; color: var(--wlgold) !important;}
.wl a:hover { color: #34502c !important; background-color: var(--wlgold) !important; box-shadow:none !important;}

/* Manually stopping image link from lighting up */
#page-content td a:last-of-type, .wl a:last-of-type { background-color: transparent !important; box-shadow: none !important;}

/*  CREDIT TO CO-AUTHOR (OUTDATED, BUT COULD BE GOOD REFERENCE CODE LATER) */
.collab {
  font-size: 0.8em;
  font-style: italic;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
#page-content .collab::before {
    content: "⠀⠀⠀collaboration with ";
}
[[/module]]

[[=]]
嗨，我是[[*user AnActualCrow]]！这是我的作者页，但你可能已经知道了。

文章顺序为最新→最旧。本页包括的同人图如下所述。

如果一年都联系不到我，我希望我所有的合著作品都归各自的合著者所有。所有剩余的文章分给[[*user Dysadron]]与[[*user gremlingroup]].
author: Helen Evens
